mapper.sql: i_e_record_id, user_id, i_c_category_id, num, note, create_time
mapper.select: select c.son_category as sonCategory, sum(r.num) as num from i_e_record r, i_e_category c where c.i_e_category_id = r.i_e_category_id and r.user_id = #{userId} and DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(r.create_time, INTERVAL 8 hour), '%Y-%m-%d') between #{fromTime} and #{toTime} and c.parent_category = #{parentCategory} group by sonCategory

select sum(r.num) as num from i_e_record r, i_e_category c where c.i_e_category_id = r.i_e_category_id and r.user_id = #{userId} and DATE(DATE_ADD(r.create_time, INTERVAL 8 hour)) = CURDATE() and c.parent_category = #{parentCategory}

select sum(r.num) as num from i_e_record r, i_e_category c where c.i_e_category_id = r.i_e_category_id and r.user_id = #{userId} and YEARWEEK(date_format(DATE_ADD(r.create_time, INTERVAL 8 hour), '%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now()) and c.parent_category = #{parentCategory}

select sum(r.num) as num from i_e_record r, i_e_category c where c.i_e_category_id = r.i_e_category_id and r.user_id = #{userId} and DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(r.create_time, INTERVAL 8 hour), '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') and c.parent_category = #{parentCategory}

select sum(r.num) as num from i_e_record r, i_e_category c where c.i_e_category_id = r.i_e_category_id and r.user_id = #{userId} and YEAR(DATE_ADD(r.create_time, INTERVAL 8 hour)) = YEAR(NOW()) and c.parent_category = #{parentCategory}
select sum(r.num) as num from i_e_record r where r.user_id = #{userId} and DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(r.create_time, INTERVAL 8 hour), '%Y-%m') = #{yearMonth}

select count(1) as recordNum, sum(r.num) as num from i_e_record r, i_e_category c where c.i_e_category_id = r.i_e_category_id and r.user_id = #{userId} and DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(r.create_time, INTERVAL 8 hour), '%Y-%m') = #{yearMonth} and c.parent_category = #{parentCategory}
select sum(r.num) as num from i_e_record r where r.user_id = #{userId} and DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(r.create_time, INTERVAL 8 hour), '%Y') = #{year}

select count(1) as recordNum, sum(r.num) as num from i_e_record r, i_e_category c where c.i_e_category_id = r.i_e_category_id and r.user_id = #{userId} and DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(r.create_time, INTERVAL 8 hour), '%Y') = #{year} and c.parent_category = #{parentCategory}
